channel.title: Introduction to Shiny
channel.description: Recent content on Introduction to Shiny

item.description: Shiny Workshop div.sourceCode { overflow-x: auto; } table.sourceCode, tr.sourceCode, td.lineNumbers, td.sourceCode { margin: 0; padding: 0; vertical-align: baseline; border: none; } table.sourceCode { width: 100%; line-height: 100%; } td.lineNumbers { text-align: right; padding-right: 4px; padding-left: 4px; color: #aaaaaa; border-right: 1px solid #aaaaaa; } td.sourceCode { padding-left: 5px; } code span.kw { color: #007020; font-weight: bold; } /* Keyword */ code span.dt { color: #902000; } /* DataType */ code span.

item.title: About
item.description: This site is written using Hugo, the learn theme, and hosted on github.
